snippet: Adopting a conduct code would clarify the rules that apply to the justices and greatly bolster public confidence in the court.
abstract: Editorial asserts Chief Justice John Roberts Jr failed to address growing concerns about ethical behavior and conflicts of interest on the Supreme Court in his report on the federal judiciary; holds adopting a code of conduct would clarify the rules that apply to Supreme Court justices and greatly bolster public confidence.
lead_paragraph: Adopting a conduct code would clarify the rules that apply to the justices and greatly bolster public confidence in the court.
